name: Amoozed
description:
My first pico game!

Amoozed is a maze puzzler and port of another of my games, Amazed, with a few different mechanics.

Controls are simple:

Arrow keys control movement

To start, press X

Alt+Enter gets you out of full screen, if it starts in full screen mode

Go around, collect vegetables and see how far you can go!

Fruits will give extra steps, but be careful! They give a lot more points when you don't collect them!

Points breakdown:

Level up: 100

Veggy: 50

Fruit, collected: 1

Fruit, not collected on level up: 50

This game was made possible due to my patrons:

  • arc
  • Pupper! ^-^ (Ulvra)
  • Jenny Koda
  • Larissa Hanson

If you want to support me and become a patron yourself: https://www.patreon.com/maxine_red

I offer some perks and add new ones when I see fit. You can also expect Patreon only games and/or discounts as a patron!
